sect1.title: dvd+rw-tools-&dvd-rw-tools-version;

sect2.title: Installation of dvd+rw-tools
sect2.para: Install dvd+rw-tools by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
sed -i '/stdlib/a #include <limits.h>' transport.hxx && sed -i 's#mkisofs"#xorrisofs"#' growisofs.c && sed -i 's#mkisofs#xorrisofs#;s#MKISOFS#XORRISOFS#' growisofs.1 &&
make all rpl8 btcflash

sect2.para: This package does not come with a test suite.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: sed -i '/stdlib/a #include <limits.h>' ...: This sed includes limits.h, one of the kernel headers. This is needed due to a change in the 2.6.23 kernel headers.
sed -i 's#mkisofs"#xorrisofs"#' growisofs.c: This sed changes the code to use xorrisofs from . The default was for it to use mkisofs from Cdrtools.
sed -i 's#mkisofs#xorrisofs#;s#MKISOFS#XORRISOFS#' growisofs.1: This sed fixes the man page to account for the above change.
make all rpl8 btcflash: This command uses additional targets so that all the utilities are built.
